query:
SELECT 
  a.id,
  a.customerId,
  a.serviceId,
  s.name as serviceName,
  a.phoneNumber,
  a.status,
  a.smsCode,
  a.smshubActivationId,
  a.createdAt
FROM activations a
JOIN services s ON a.serviceId = s.id
WHERE s.name LIKE '%Outros%'
ORDER BY a.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1;
